trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 执行安全操作。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Files and directories are specified using absolute paths.
trans-unit.target: 使用绝对路径指定文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: When accessing files, a security check is performed when the file is created or opened.
trans-unit.target: 当访问文件，创建或打开文件时执行安全检查。

trans-unit.source: The security check is not done again unless the file is closed and reopened.
trans-unit.target: 除非关闭并重新打开该文件的安全检查不再次执行。

trans-unit.source: Checking permissions when the file is first accessed minimizes the impact of the security check on application performance because opening a file happens only once, while reading and writing can happen multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 检查权限时首次访问该文件可尽量减小对应用程序性能的安全检查的影响，因为打开的文件只发生一次，而读取和写入可发生多次。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
trans-unit.target: 允许声明的范围取决于<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>使用。

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通过安全特性声明的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中存储和在运行时访问系统。

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 安全属性仅用于声明性安全。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.
trans-unit.target: 对于命令性安全，使用相应的权限类。

trans-unit.source: `Unrestricted` <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> grants permission for all paths within a file system, including multiple pathnames that can be used to access a single given file.
trans-unit.target: `Unrestricted` <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> 授予在文件系统，包括多个可用来访问某一特定文件的路径名中的所有路径的权限。

trans-unit.source: To <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> access to a file, you must `Deny` all possible paths to the file.
trans-unit.target: 到<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A>访问到文件中，你必须`Deny`文件的所有可能路径。

trans-unit.source: For example, if \\\server\share is mapped to the network drive X, to `Deny` access to \\\server\share\file, you must `Deny` \\\server\share\file, X:\file and any other path that you can use to access the file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果\\\server\share 为映射到网络驱动器 X，`Deny`访问\\\server\share\file，你必须`Deny` \\\server\share\file X:\file，你可以使用的其他任何路径访问文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to request <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> by using the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute> class, indicating the only permission that is to be granted to the code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何请求<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>类中，指出是向代码授予的唯一权限。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何要求调用代码具有不受限制<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>。

trans-unit.source: You typically make demands in managed libraries (DLLs) to help protect methods or classes from potentially harmful code.
trans-unit.target: 通常在托管库 (Dll) 来帮助防止潜在的有害代码的方法或类中提出的要求。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates several instances of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute> class to set varying levels of file I/O permissions.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的几个实例<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>类来设置不同的文件 I/O 权限级别。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="action" /> parameter is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="action" /> 参数不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets full access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对字符串值所指定的文件或目录的完全访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory for full access.
trans-unit.target: 用于完全访问的文件或目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This property sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为单个文件或目录的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他属性指定的其他文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.All%2A> property to grant full access to the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.All%2A>属性，以授予对指定目录的完全访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The get method is not supported for this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不支持 get 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the permitted access to all files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对所有文件的允许访问权限。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> values that represents the permissions for all files.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值的按位组合，表示所有文件的权限。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置对在本地计算机和网络驱动器上的所有文件的允许访问权限。

trans-unit.source: An individual <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.
trans-unit.target: 个人<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>值可以由使用按位`AND`操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对所有本地文件的允许访问权限。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> values that represents the permissions for all local files.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值的按位组合，它表示所有本地文件的权限。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: Local files are files contained on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 本地文件是包含在本地计算机上的文件。

trans-unit.source: Any files that are not accessed through a network drive are local files.
trans-unit.target: 通过网络驱动器不访问任何文件是本地文件。

trans-unit.source: An individual <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> value can be determined by using a bitwise `AND` operation.
trans-unit.target: 个人<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>值可以由使用按位`AND`操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets append access for the file or directory that is specified by the string value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对字符串值所指定的文件或目录的追加访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory for append access.
trans-unit.target: 用于追加访问的文件或目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This property sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为单个文件或目录的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他属性指定的其他文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Append%2A> property to grant <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append> access to files in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Append%2A>属性，以授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append>访问指定的目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可在其中更改访问控制信息的文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 可在其中更改访问控制信息的文件或目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置的单个文件或目录的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use additional <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute> attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>特性来指定其他文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties.
trans-unit.target: 访问控制列表 (ACL) 描述个人或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件和其属性上的特定操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: The ability to change an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改 ACL 的功能是重要的权限，以及应多加小心授予。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 与此属性对应的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: 绝不能由应用程序代码，应仅由安全系统中，调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在编译时，属性将安全声明转换为元数据中序列化形式。

trans-unit.source: Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 从权限，此方法返回对应于此属性创建元数据中的声明性安全数据。

trans-unit.source: The path information for a file or directory for which access is to be secured contains invalid characters or wildcard specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 要保护访问安全的文件或目录的路径信息包含无效的字符或通配说明符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file or directory to which to grant path discovery.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置针对其授予路径发现权限的文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 文件或目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Path discovery controls access to the information in the path itself.
trans-unit.target: 路径发现控制对自身的路径中的信息的访问。

trans-unit.source: This helps protect sensitive information in the path, such as user names, as well as information about the directory structure revealed in the path.
trans-unit.target: 这可以保护路径中的敏感信息（如用户名）以及有关路径中显示的目录结构的信息。

trans-unit.source: This value does not grant access to files or folders represented by the path.
trans-unit.target: 此值不授予对路径所指代的文件或文件夹的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A> should be granted only to directories, not to files.
trans-unit.target: 出于性能原因，<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A>应仅授予目录，而不授予文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A> permission should be granted to paths such as C:\test and C:\test\\, not to files such as C:\test\example.txt.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A>如 C:\test 和 C:\test 路径应授予权限\\，而不适用于文件，如 C:\test\example.txt。

trans-unit.source: This property sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为单个文件或目录的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他属性指定的其他文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A> property to grant <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery> access to files in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A>属性，以授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery>访问指定的目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets read access for the file or directory specified by the string value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对字符串值所指定的文件或目录的读访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory for read access.
trans-unit.target: 用于读访问的文件或目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This property sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为单个文件或目录的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他属性指定的其他文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Read%2A> property to grant <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read> access to files in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Read%2A>属性，以授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read>访问指定的目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file or directory in which access control information can be viewed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可在其中查看访问控制信息的文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory in which access control information can be viewed.
trans-unit.target: 可在其中查看访问控制信息的文件或目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取或设置的单个文件或目录的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use additional <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute> attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>特性来指定其他文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties.
trans-unit.target: 访问控制列表 (ACL) 描述个人或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件和其属性上的特定操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: The ability to view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.
trans-unit.target: 能够查看 ACL 是重要的权限，并应被授予时要格外小心。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file or directory in which file data can be viewed and modified.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可在其中查看并修改文件数据的文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory in which file data can be viewed and modified.
trans-unit.target: 可在其中查看并修改文件数据的文件或目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This property sets the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Append%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Read%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Write%2A> properties for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Append%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.PathDiscovery%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Read%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Write%2A>单个文件或目录的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use additional <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute> attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute>特性来指定其他文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: The access rights are for file data only; they do not include the access control properties <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ViewAccessControl%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ChangeAccessControl%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 都仅; 用于文件数据的访问权限它们不包括访问控件属性<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ViewAccessControl%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.ChangeAccessControl%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `get` accessor is provided for C# compiler compatibility.
trans-unit.target: `get`访问器提供用于 C# 编译器兼容性。

trans-unit.source: The C# compiler requires attribute properties to be read/write.
trans-unit.target: C# 编译器需要特性属性为读/写。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="get" /> accessor is called.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="get" /> 访问器被调用。

trans-unit.source: The accessor is provided only for C# compiler compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 提供访问器是为了与 C# 编译器兼容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets write access for the file or directory specified by the string value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对字符串值所指定的文件或目录的写访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory for write access.
trans-unit.target: 用于写访问的文件或目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This property sets access for a single file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为单个文件或目录的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use additional attributes to specify additional files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他属性指定的其他文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Write%2A> property to grant <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write> access to files in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAttribute.Write%2A>属性，以授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write>访问指定的目录中的文件。
